name: Smart LED TV 55-inch
description: Immersive 4K experience with smart features and sleek design. Perfect for your living room.

faq.question: Does it support HDR?
faq.answer: Yes, it supports HDR10 and HLG.

faq.question: Can I mount it on a wall?
faq.answer: Yes, it is VESA mount compatible (200x200mm).

name: Men's Classic Denim Jacket
description: Durable and stylish denim jacket for everyday wear. A timeless addition to any wardrobe.

faq.question: Is it machine washable?
faq.answer: Yes, machine wash cold with similar colors. Tumble dry low.

faq.question: Does it run true to size?
faq.answer: Generally, yes. We recommend checking our size chart for best fit.

name: Smart Coffee Maker
description: Brew your perfect cup from anywhere with this Wi-Fi enabled smart coffee maker.

faq.answer: Yes, it integrates seamlessly with Google Home and Amazon Alexa.

faq.question: What kind of coffee grounds does it use?

name: Sci-Fi Novel: 'Galactic Odyssey'
author: Anya Sharma
description: A thrilling journey through distant galaxies and ancient civilizations. A must-read for sci-fi fans.

faq.question: Is this part of a series?
faq.answer: Yes, it's the first book in the 'Cosmic Chronicles' series.

faq.question: Is an e-book version available?
faq.answer: Yes, the e-book is available on our digital store.

name: Professional Yoga Mat
description: Non-slip and durable yoga mat for all levels of practice. Comes with a carrying strap.

faq.question: How do I clean the mat?
faq.answer: Wipe with a damp cloth and mild soap. Air dry.

faq.question: Is it suitable for hot yoga?
faq.answer: Yes, its non-slip surface is effective even with sweat.
